summary: The Lord of Dremora, is a simple mod that adds in a powerful Dremora found inside the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.
descriptionHtml:
[right][u][size=4][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]The Lord of Dremora[/font][/size][/u]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=2][i]The Lord of Dremora, is a simple mod that adds in a powerful Dremora found inside the Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon.
This is just a mod I made for people who wanted a little boss battle after collecting the Razor![/i][/size][/font][/right]
author: TheOnlyGuildMaster
